item.description:
Have you ever wanted to meet someone at a social gathering (meetup events, parties, networking events, bars, etc), but didn't know what to say, or started talking to someone and got stuck in your own head no knowing what to say?

Wouldn't it be great if you had a simple system you could use again and again to effortlessly know exactly what to say to start the conversation and keep it going with the people you're talking to?

Well that's what you're going to learn at this seminar. Your conversations will flow effortlessly, and you won't get stuck in your head or have to worry about what direction to take the conversation or what to talk about.  Instead when you meet people you know exactly what to say that will lead you to new dates with them.

Imagine being at a meetup event or get-together and gliding around the room talking with anyone and everyone without getting in your own way or being stuck in your head. Imagine having a game plan so you don't get in your own way and people approach you to start a conversation because they see others having a good time talking with you, and they want to see what you're all about.

*************************************************
HERE'S A SMALL SAMPLE OF WHAT YOU'LL LEARN:
*************************************************

  • A simple system that gives you the power to know exactly what to say, so you don't get stuck in your own head or have awkward silences in conversations that end with you being rejected.
  • An almost magical phrase that I stumbled on that instantly gets you back on track if you ever don't know what to talk about in any situation.

  • The simple secrets of getting out of your own way so you can meet new people where ever you go.
  • The 3 "way points" that allow you to get a date whenever you're talking to someone new. Follow this check list and your conversations will always lead toward a date.

  • And much more!

    *************************************************
    HOW TO GET INVOLVED
    *************************************************

    The meeting is limited to 20 people due to the size limitations of the classroom (we'll be moving around a lot). Our meetings usually sell out quickly, so here's what I recommend.

    #1 - Check your calendar right now, and see if you have Sunday, June 12th available. The meeting runs from 3:30pm to 5:30pm and is conveniently located in Harvard Square, less than 5 minutes walk from the red line.

    #2 - If you have that afternoon free, go ahead and RSVP for this workshop right now. Trust me, it's going to fill up fast. They always do.

    #3 - Write it in your calendar so you remember to attend, and please arrive at 3:15pm for registration and personal networking.

    The cost of the event is only $20, which is a bargain for a professional training that includes these skill-building drills + personality feedback. Please remember to bring:
    • $20 cash
    • A pen
    • A great attitude
    • And a willingness to learn fun, new things.

    I'm looking forward to seeing you there.

    Eric

    P.S. - Take down my cell number in case you have any questions about the event or if you get lost. The venue is extremely easy to find, so you should have no problems. My cell is: 617-903-7371.

Special Note:  We will be in 42 Brattle St for this meetup in the Music Room.  If you're a regular attendee, make sure to remember we're in a different room for this meetup!
item.how_to_find_us: We are in the Music Room - 1st floor, 3rd door on the right when you walk in, says Music Room above the door. The front desk can direct you if you have trouble.
item.name: How To Have Amazing Conversations That Attract The Opposite Sex
